resources.string:
Trifyllias & Lampsa Str., 115 24, Ampelokipoi 
(Panormou Metro Station)

Open Hours: 10:00 to 22:00

The Myrtillo Café was set up by the Myrtillo Social Co-operative Enterprise with the aim of providing training, work experience and access to the labour market for people from vulnerable social groups, primarily young people with moderate learning disability.
Social Enterprise of the Year 2014 | Social Business Excellence Awards 2014
If you are interested in working as volunteers, salaried personnel, coordinators, instructors, specialists, advisors or as artists, contact Myrtillo Café!
